line.text: %MAGNETOSIMPLE%: This is where the heaviest fighting occurred between my airships and the forces of Apocalypse.

%MAGNETOSIMPLE%: Just when it appeared we would defeat our attackers, Apocalypse activated an electromagnetic pulse bomb. The shock wave burnt out the electronic systems of ships on both sides. The aircraft dropped to the ground like stones and that is why shattered hulks litter this area.
%MAGNETOSIMPLE%: And somewhere in this wasteland is a young woman named Blink. We must save her.
